title: Nerf Zed so he Isn't Banned 90% of the Time
body:
Hey, Rito Gems.
I know you just nerfed Zed, but I request you to nerf him more. Why you may ask? I want you to nerf him so he can actually be played in ranked. Im getting quite frustrate how I never get to play my main and Im losing quite a bit of lp.

Thanks Rito Gems
Sincerly Edday.

replies.body:
I ban zed because:

1. Zed players are pricks
2. Zed players are awful, so it's like banning Aurelion Sol on the day of his release so plebs won't be able to mess up on him.
3. Zed is annoying to deal with, I don't even play midlane, but I don't want to see that scum in my game.

Get a new main. Honestly, it's better for you.
I wish they'd only nerf what is strong at LCS level. Lower tiers need to learn how to counterplay these so-called "OP" champions.

I mean, Zed isn't even the top ban, if i play ranked i struggle to get much done cause a lot of my top champions (Ekko, Kindred, Nidalee) are in the top bans currently.

You should feel fine considering it's only the one champion for mid that is really being banned out.
Zed is banned because people don't know how to deal with him not because he's OP

Champions are banned for a number of different reasons- Not just because they are strong.

For example, If my usual ban of Yi is gone, I tend to ban champions such as Yas, Zed and Vayne. Champions that require high amounts of mechanical skill to pull of can be quite risky to let through, as there is a chance someone on your team will pick them and end up going full potato (everyone in silver/bronze seems to "main" the hard champions).

A good idea is to expand your champion pool to encompass a wider range of champions, not just what is considered OP. I see that your champion pool consists mainly of high priority picks/bans which can make it a little difficult sometimes. Picking more champions for your roles will allow you to have a a bit more room for fitting into your team comp (like, if your entire team was AD, you wouldn't want to pick Zed), and one of your mains will get through banning phase safely.
